name: di-decorators
description: Simple Dependency Injection with ES Decorators

scripts.build-coverage: npm run clean-coverage && node_modules/.bin/babel di.js >> coverage/di.js && node_modules/.bin/babel di-es6.spec.js >> coverage/di-es6.spec.js &&  node_modules/.bin/jscoverage coverage/di.js coverage/di.js
scripts.coverage: npm run build-coverage && node_modules/.bin/mocha -R html-cov coverage/di-es6.spec.js >> coverage/index.html
scripts.coveralls: npm run build-coverage && node_modules/.bin/mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter coverage/di-es6.spec.js | node_modules/.bin/coveralls

author: Luis Oliveira <luisgustavo.vilela@gmail.com> (http://github.com/lgvo)
